actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to declare the public policy of the United States and to remove all legal obstacles to the use of gold clauses.

summary.text: Allows the inclusion of clauses which require payment in gold or any particular kind of coin or currency in contracts entered into on or after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to declare the public policy of the United States and to remove all legal obstacles to the use of gold clauses.
